com.hcl.domino.dbdirectory

Enum DirectorySearchQuery.SearchFlag

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Enum<DirectorySearchQuery.SearchFlag>
      • com.hcl.domino.dbdirectory.DirectorySearchQuery.SearchFlag
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, Comparable<DirectorySearchQuery.SearchFlag>
    Enclosing interface:
    DirectorySearchQuery

    public static enum DirectorySearchQuery.SearchFlag
extends Enum<DirectorySearchQuery.SearchFlag>
    Flags to control result of the Database.queryDQL(com.hcl.domino.dql.DQL.DQLTerm). These values can be bitwise ORed together to combine functionality. Note: The values are directly taken from
    Author:
    Karsten Lehmann

    • Enum Constant Summary

      Enum Constants 
      Enum Constant and Description
      ALL_VERSIONS
      Include deleted and non-matching notes in search (ALWAYS "ON" in partial searches, which are searches using a since date!)
      ALLCHILDREN
      Search includes all children of matching documents.
      ALLDESCENDANTS
      Search includes all descendants of matching documents.
      ALLPRIVS
      return error if we don't have full privileges
      DATAONLY_FORMULA
      Search formula applies only to data notes, i.e., others match
      FILETYPE
      For directory mode file type filtering.
      FULL_DATACUTOFF
      Full search (as if Since was "1") but exclude DATA notes prior to passed-in Since time
      NAMED_GHOSTS
      Include *** ALL *** named ghost notes in the search (profile docs, xACL's, etc).
      NOABSTRACTS
      Filter out "Truncated" documents
      NOITEMNAMES
      by using this search option combined with a map of (key=programmatic column name, value=column formula) entries, the NSF search function just returns these specified column values instead of the whole note's summary buffer.
      NONREPLICATABLE
      INCLUDE notes with non-replicatable OID flag
      NOPRIVCHECK
      Allow search to return id's only i.e.
      NOTIFYDELETIONS
      Set NOTE_CLASS_NOTIFYDELETION bit of NoteClass for deleted notes
      ONLYPROTECTED
      Return only docs with protection fields (BS_PROTECTED set in note header)
      PROFILE_DOCS
      Include profile documents (a specific type of named ghost note) in the search Note: set SELECT_NAMED_GHOSTS, too, if you want the selection formula to be applied to the profile docs (so as not to get them all back as matches).
      SELECT_NAMED_GHOSTS
      flag to let the selection formula be run against profile documents; must be used together with PROFILE_DOCS
      SESSION_USERNAME
      Use current session's user name, not server's
      SOFTDELETIONS
      Return soft deleted documents
      SUMMARY
      TRUE to return summary buffer with each match

    • Enum Constant Detail

      • ALL_VERSIONS

        public static final DirectorySearchQuery.SearchFlag ALL_VERSIONS
        Include deleted and non-matching notes in search (ALWAYS "ON" in partial searches, which are searches using a since date!)

      • SUMMARY

        public static final DirectorySearchQuery.SearchFlag SUMMARY
        TRUE to return summary buffer with each match

      • FILETYPE

        public static final DirectorySearchQuery.SearchFlag FILETYPE
        For directory mode file type filtering. If set, "NoteClassMask" is treated as a FILE_xxx mask for directory filtering

      • NOTIFYDELETIONS

        public static final DirectorySearchQuery.SearchFlag NOTIFYDELETIONS
        Set NOTE_CLASS_NOTIFYDELETION bit of NoteClass for deleted notes

      • NOITEMNAMES

        public static final DirectorySearchQuery.SearchFlag NOITEMNAMES
        by using this search option combined with a map of (key=programmatic column name, value=column formula) entries, the NSF search function just returns these specified column values instead of the whole note's summary buffer. This speeds up indexing, as Notes has to copy less data and less data needs to be parsed.

      • ALLPRIVS

        public static final DirectorySearchQuery.SearchFlag ALLPRIVS
        return error if we don't have full privileges

      • SESSION_USERNAME

        public static final DirectorySearchQuery.SearchFlag SESSION_USERNAME
        Use current session's user name, not server's

      • NOABSTRACTS

        public static final DirectorySearchQuery.SearchFlag NOABSTRACTS
        Filter out "Truncated" documents

      • DATAONLY_FORMULA

        public static final DirectorySearchQuery.SearchFlag DATAONLY_FORMULA
        Search formula applies only to data notes, i.e., others match

      • NONREPLICATABLE

        public static final DirectorySearchQuery.SearchFlag NONREPLICATABLE
        INCLUDE notes with non-replicatable OID flag

      • FULL_DATACUTOFF

        public static final DirectorySearchQuery.SearchFlag FULL_DATACUTOFF
        Full search (as if Since was "1") but exclude DATA notes prior to passed-in Since time

      • NOPRIVCHECK

        public static final DirectorySearchQuery.SearchFlag NOPRIVCHECK
        Allow search to return id's only i.e. no summary buffer

      • ALLCHILDREN

        public static final DirectorySearchQuery.SearchFlag ALLCHILDREN
        Search includes all children of matching documents.

      • ALLDESCENDANTS

        public static final DirectorySearchQuery.SearchFlag ALLDESCENDANTS
        Search includes all descendants of matching documents.

      • NAMED_GHOSTS

        public static final DirectorySearchQuery.SearchFlag NAMED_GHOSTS
        Include *** ALL *** named ghost notes in the search (profile docs, xACL's, etc). Note: use SEARCH1_PROFILE_DOCS, etc., introduced in R6, for finer control

      • ONLYPROTECTED

        public static final DirectorySearchQuery.SearchFlag ONLYPROTECTED
        Return only docs with protection fields (BS_PROTECTED set in note header)

      • SOFTDELETIONS

        public static final DirectorySearchQuery.SearchFlag SOFTDELETIONS
        Return soft deleted documents

      • SELECT_NAMED_GHOSTS

        public static final DirectorySearchQuery.SearchFlag SELECT_NAMED_GHOSTS
        flag to let the selection formula be run against profile documents; must be used together with PROFILE_DOCS

      • PROFILE_DOCS

        public static final DirectorySearchQuery.SearchFlag PROFILE_DOCS
        Include profile documents (a specific type of named ghost note) in the search Note: set SELECT_NAMED_GHOSTS, too, if you want the selection formula to be applied to the profile docs (so as not to get them all back as matches).
